items.title: Sona Comstar plans domestic magnet production to cut China imports
items.description: The US currently accounts for about 40% of Sona Comstar's revenue, ahead of India and Europe.

items.title: IndusInd Bank sends CEO shortlist to RBI for approval, say sources
items.description: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) had asked IndusInd Bank for names by June 30.

items.title: Why Akzo Nobel India’s minority shareholders may have got a profitable exit
items.description: JSW Paints’ acquisition of the Dulux-maker has been designed as a win-win for all including shareholders, but much depends on what happens next

items.title: Actis-Mahindra Lifespace JV launches industrial and logistics park with Rs 800 crore investment
items.description: The joint venture, Ample Parks, was launched in 2022, with the investment plans being announced last year

items.title: Quick Take: Torrent Pharma puts the money where its heart is
items.description: Torrent’s India business has been outperforming the domestic market

items.title: PSU lender flags NPA risk as Telangana faces Rs 1,400-crore irrigation loan default: Report
items.description: Two Telangana irrigation SPVs face potential NPA classification as REC flags overdue repayments, raising concerns over state-backed off-budget borrowing and its impact on PSU lenders

items.title: Is it now the right time to invest in Tata Tech?
items.description: Strategic wins and partnerships contrast with cautious guidance

items.title: Top-deck exit at Apollo Global Management; Utsav Baijal steps down, headed to Bain Capital
items.description: During his stint, the firm has bet on IPO-bound JSW Cement and HeroFinCorp as well as InterGlobe Technologies, Monnet Ispat , Mytrah Energy and Avantha Holdings via Aion Capital ( a JV with ICICI Ventures). Recently, an Apollo-led investor group sealed a $750 mn deal with Adani's Mumbai Airport

items.title: Piramal Pharma Solutions breaks ground on $90 mn US expansion
items.description: This investment aims to add commercial-scale manufacturing capabilities and enhance the capacity and efficiency of both sites

items.title: From zero to record high stocks, how India turned around coal supplies to its power sector
items.description: Power plants are well equipped with coal for the monsoon months, according to ministry officials.
